definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天氣裏，徒步旅行甚是愜意。

sentences.english: I am now at a very pleasant cottage window looking onto a beautiful hilly country, with a view of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我正愜意地臨窗而坐，眺望遠山如黛，碧海連天。

sentences.english: The nudists will enjoy their beautiful summer day at the resort of Usedom.
sentences.chinese: 遊客將在烏塞敦的裸體村莊內度過夏日愜意的一天。

sentences.english: A soothing delicate unscented amber for use on sensitive, dry or irritated complexions . Men love its calming effects after shaving.
sentences.chinese: 用於敏感的皮膚，調節膚色，帶來愜意的舒緩感覺。

sentences.english: It is really good, the feeling is very comfortable after smoked, so I have been smoking until now.
sentences.chinese: 真的不錯，抽完感到很愜意，因此一直抽到現在。

sentences.english: Peace, my heart, let the time for the parting be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 愜意沉着荒僻默默吧，我的心，讓分此外時刻甜柔吧。

sentences.english: It brings you cozy feeling with soft tactile.
sentences.chinese: 它以柔軟的觸感帶給你愜意的感覺。

sentences.english: Swivel parts being connected Withbearing. It's comfortable when swiveling and gliding.
sentences.chinese: 轉動部件軸承連接，能前後搖擺轉動更多舒適愜意。

sentences.english: Pat was concerned winning it all would make us too comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 帕特擔心大獲全勝會使我們太過愜意放鬆。

sentences.english: It is easily the most habitable season of the year.
sentences.chinese: 因爲秋天無疑是一年中最愜意的季節。

sentences.english: and it's always nice to kind of sit outside and have a coffee at it, so yeah.
sentences.chinese: 坐在室外，然後喝一杯咖啡，這樣真的很愜意。

sentences.english: The motorist enjoys an unobstructed view of the natural scenery as he drives across the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 躲開交通堵塞，去看看鄉村的自然風光，真太愜意了。

sentences.english: It is a warm sun tan, slowly crawled, feel very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 它曬着溫暖的太陽，慢慢地爬動着，感到十分愜意。

sentences.english: It is an ideal place to relax with elegant and pleasant environment.
sentences.chinese: 環境優雅愜意，是享受健體強身閒暇一刻的理想場所。

sentences.english: They are doing their work in a place in which they feel comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他們在他們自感愜意的場所工作。

sentences.english: Awesome bed designed to be as comfortable and cozy as a nest.
sentences.chinese: 這張超讚的牀被設計成一個舒適愜意的巢。

definition: lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
